alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 13 at 8:13AM EST until January 15 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations greater than 7 inches possible within lake effect snow along and north of Route 28. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roadways and low visibility from heavy lake effect snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...No additional snow accumulation is expected this morning as precipitation has changed to rain. However, snowfall will return by Sunday afternoon due to lake effect. Gusty winds may allow for blowing and drifting of snow at times on Sunday into Sunday night.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
